title: organizer.address
description:
The address the [organizer](./organizer.json) is located at. Localized because some parts like the municipality or street address can be different in Dutch, French, German and/or English.

Requires at least one locale, specifically the one defined in the [mainLanguage](./organizer-mainLanguage.json) of the organizer.

**Only add a localized version if it's an official variant!**
